title: The developer apparently lacks the knowledge of
comment: how cellular phone works. When an user is speaking on the phone, the phone system needs to allocate most of its bandwidth to the voice transmission, only if there is additional bandwidth available, will it be allocated to data. If an user is talking on the phone, the amount of data transmission is so small it is neglect-able. Turning off wifi, bluetooth, GPS and mobile data saves user nothing, actually causing more harm to the device if you can't turn it back on. Reduce electromagnetic? that's a big joke.
Update the app generally works well overall it just needs some updates. The call blocker don't work but seems like all else does. Dev step up ya game!
